title: Adjusting the size
description: This video instruction describes how to properly adjust the size of your BiLumix to fit your head.

title: Power On-Off
description: This video instruction describes how to turn on/off the light on your BiLumix and details some common problems and troubleshooting tips with regards to the LED lights.

title: Battery Connection
description: This video instruction describes how to properly insert and remove the battery.

title: Replacing Cushion
description: This video instruction describes how to correctly replace the forehead cushion of your BiLumix.

title: Replacing Handle
description: This video instruction describes how to replace the handle used to flip your Bilumix headlamp up and down.

title: Light cap replacement
description: This video instruction describes how to properly replace the plastic light caps on the two LED lights of your BiLumix.

title: Head support replacement
description: This video instruction describes how to correctly replace the head support on the underside of your BiLumix located towards the back.

title: 1.5x loupe setup
description: This video instruction describes how to properly set up and remove your 1.5x or 2.0x loupes of your BiLumix.

title: 3.5x loupe setup
description: This video instruction describes how to properly set up and remove your 3.5x loupes of your BiLumix.

title: Calibrating loupe
description: This video instruction describes how to properly calibrate your 3.5x loupes to match your interpupillary distance and your focal/working distance.

title: Adjusting forehead band
description: This video instruction describes how to adjust the forehead band of your BiLumix to the most comfortable distance away from your head for a more customized fit.

title: Troubleshooting
description: This video describes troubleshooting tips with regards to the LED lights not turning on.

title: Switching lenses
description: This video instruction describes how to easily switch your loupes from the basic 1.5x to the 2.5x or 3.5x loupes and vice versa.
